entry.title: 150W LED Pole Light With Photocell ; 5700K ; Universal Mount ; Silver ; AC100-277V

Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 261.28

This pole light by LEDMyplace can easily replace the traditional metal-halide pole light to provide you with 75% savings in energy. The 150W LED pole light being available as slim and sleek, in silver color, is designed to increase the safety and security in any outdoor environment. You have 5 years of hassle-free manufacturer’s warranty on this product.

entry.title: LED Flood Light With Photocell, 450W, 5700K, 60750 LM, AC277-480V, Bronze, With 20KV Surge Protector, Stadium Flood Light
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Flood Lights
Price: 1154.79

Install this 450-watt flood light fixture to enjoy the happiness that comes with adequate outdoor lighting. You won't need a mounting pole to install this fixture because it's a flood-mount. You can instead mount it on walls or other stable surfaces. It will operate on an AC277-480V input and produce 135 lumens per watt of light. As a result, you can be assured that it will provide adequate illumination while using minimal energy. This light is a dusk-to-dawn fixture with a photocell sensor that turns on and off in response to outdoor lighting conditions. This fixture's aluminum alloy housing provides excellent heat sinking and sturdiness, so you can count on it for everyday outdoor lighting. This lighting fixture has an IP65 rating, ensuring that it is safe to use in a wet outdoor environment. It's a dependable lighting product thanks to the use of a strong driver and a 20KV surge protector. Surface-mounted (SMD) LED chips with a 50,000-hour operational life are used in the pole light. It also comes with a five-year warranty. As a result, you can be assured that it will last for many years!

This LED flood light comes with a lumen output of 60750 lumens, a wide beam angle of 150 x 85Degree, a CCT of 5700K, and a CRI>80. This LED fixture is a UL, DLC-approved product and can easily replace up to 1575W of any metal-halide lighting fixture saving you marginally on utility bills.

entry.title: 240W LED Pole Light, Universal Mount, Photocell, Bronze, LED Parking Lot Lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 360.73

Dedicatedly designed to increase safety and security, these LED Pole Lights are the perfect illumination for your outdoor spaces. The most suitable places to install these LED Area Lights are building entrances, parking lots, parkways, streets, gardens, hotel walkways, and other outdoor spaces. Pole lights of 240 Watt replace metal halide bulbs of 840 Watt and deliver superior lumen output of 34000 lumens and a CCT of 5700K. These high-voltage pole lights are a durable and long-lasting lighting fixture. Tested to last around 50,000 hours. These LED Pole Lights have a robust build and IP65 certification, proving the fixture to be splash and dirt proof. This pole light fixture is photocell compatible (dusk to dawn sensors) and can help you regulate energy usage by automating the ON/ OFF process.
